item.title: More Introductory Group Theory
item.description: We’ve already introduced some of the topics of Group Theory. In this entry we’ll talk about Lagrange’s Theorem, various morphisms, and try to tie it back to our ongoing discussion of permutations. We’ll also give some examples of groups…
